text: Sander Lloyd Nelson (December 1, 1938 â€“ February 14, 2022) was an American rock drummer. Nelson was one of the best-known rock drummers of the early 1960s.Bob Cianci, Great Rock Drummers of the Sixties. Hal Leonard Corporation, 2005, pp.120-131 He was born in Santa Monica, California. His career began in 1959. His best known singles were "Teen Beat" and "Let There Be Drums". Nelson died under hospice care in Las Vegas, Nevada on February 14, 2022 at the age of 83.Noted drummer Nelson dies ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American rock drummers Category:Musicians from Santa Monica, California
title: Sandy Nelson
